name: Super Baby (Rudberg Studios) (Rudberg Studios)
description:
One day a new babysitter comes to watch over to look after the baby. The babysitter goes to sleep, so it’s the baby's time to shine. You have 90 seconds to destroy the randomly generated house as much as you can using your destructive superpowers.

 Level up, unlock skins, story parts, and charges and abilities to help you wreck the house even more!

An indie game full of chaos, with a rock soundtrack recorded live, over a million possible levels, a heartwarming story in the style of an arcade classic, super baby is an experience you don’t want to miss!
